appendText.text: Specifications: Size: 185cm x 68cm Thickness: approx. 4.2mm Weight: approx. 2.5kg Features: Non-slip GripForMe® top surface: Absorbs moisture to prevent slipping during intense, sweaty sessions. Laser-etched AlignForMe® design: Enhances posture and body awareness for safer, more effective practice. Stable cushioned foundation: Absorbs impact and reduces joint discomfort for comfortable practice. Sustainable materials: Made with sustainably sourced natural rubber and Liforme’s proprietary eco-polyurethane top layer. Non-toxic & body-kind: PVC-free and Vegan Certified. Complimentary Yoga mat bag included: Convenient for transport and storage.
